description: This table keeps track of changes in the patient's address.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: Patient ID for whom address is changed.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line count in the address change history.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_LINE1
columns.description: First line of patient's home address, current between dates recorded in columns EFF_START_DATE and EFF_END_DATE.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_LINE2
columns.description: Second line of patient's home address, current between dates recorded in columns EFF_START_DATE and EFF_END_DATE.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_LN_EXTRA
columns.description: Additional line of patient's home address, current between dates recorded in columns EFF_START_DATE and EFF_END_DATE.

columns.name: CITY_HX
columns.description: Patient's home city, current between dates recorded in columns EFF_START_DATE and EFF_END_DATE.

columns.name: COUNTY_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Patient's home county, current between dates recorded in columns EFF_START_DATE and EFF_END_DATE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ZIP_HX
columns.description: Patient's home ZIP, current between dates recorded in columns EFF_START_DATE and EFF_END_DATE.

columns.name: ADDR_CHNG_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Source of address changes.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Bridges


EpicCare


Cadence


Professional Billing


ManageCare


Chronicles


CRM


Nurse Triage


EpicWeb


EpicCare Link


Welcome

columns.name: EFF_START_DATE
columns.description: Effective start date of changed address (date when address was changed).

columns.name: EFF_END_DATE
columns.description: Effective end date of changed address (date of the next address change or NULL if this is the last address change).

columns.name: PREV_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: Audit trail item used to store the previous house number when a new house number is entered or if the current primary address is edited.

columns.name: PREV_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Audit trail item used to store the previous district when a new district is entered or if the current primary address is edited. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SIGNIFICANT_CHANGE_YN
columns.description:
Audit trail item used to store whether the address change should be considered significant when a new address is entered or if the current primary address is edited. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ADDR_HX_VALID_YN
columns.description:
This columns specifies if the historical address stored on the patient record is invalid or incorrect. A blank value means historical address is a valid older address. Use this item to indicate a patient's address was captured due to error, for example, in the case of a patient overlay.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SIGNIFICANT_CHANGE_YN

columns.name: PREV_FLOOR
columns.description: Audit trail item used to store the previous floor number when a new floor number is entered or if the current primary address is edited.

columns.name: PREV_UNIT
columns.description: Audit trail item used to store the previous unit number when a new unit number is entered or if the current primary address is edited.

columns.name: PREV_BLDG_NAM
columns.description: Audit trail item used to store the previous building name when a new building is entered or if the current primary address is edited.

columns.name: COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Audit trail item used to store the previous country when a new country is entered or if the current primary address is edited.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
